import React from "react"; import { ShimmerBadge } from "@/components/ui/ShimmerBadge"; import { toast } from "@/components/ui/GameToast"; import { LoadingSpinner } from "@/components/ui/LoadingSpinner"; import Image from "next/image"; export const EquipmentArmory: React.FC = () => (

Armory Sealed

The High Blacksmith is out gathering ore.

); export const Bestiary: React.FC<{ userLevel: number; onClose: () => void }> = ({ userLevel, onClose, }) => (

Bestiary Uncharted

The creatures of the Iron Forge are lurking in the shadows. Complete world map encounters to unlock detailed lore and weaknesses for your foes.

); export const WorldMap: React.FC<{ userLevel: number; onClose: () => void; onEnterCombat: (bossId: string) => void; }> = ({ userLevel, onClose, onEnterCombat }) => (

The Known World

DISCOVERED REGIONS: 1/12 | LEVEL: {userLevel}

{/* Boss Encounter Card */}

The Goblin King

BOSS

The ruler of the Rusted Throne seeks new victims!

?

Fog of War

Requires Level 15

); export const Grimoire: React.FC<{ onClose: () => void }> = ({ onClose }) => (

Grimoire Sealed

The pages are blank...

); export const Arena: React.FC<{ onClose: () => void }> = ({ onClose }) => (

Arena Closed

Gladiators are resting.

); export const CodexLoader: React.FC = () => (

Loading Codex...

);

"use client"; import { useState } from "react"; import { PvpSeason } from "@prisma/client"; import { PlayerRating, RankedOpponent } from "@/actions/pvp/ranked"; import { RankBadge } from "@/components/game/pvp/RankBadge"; import { MatchmakingModal } from "./MatchmakingModal"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from "@/components/ui/tabs"; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card"; import { Crown, Swords, Trophy, Users, Calendar, Info, Medal } from "lucide-react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { Faction } from "@/lib/pvpRanks"; import { UnifiedLeaderboardEntry } from "@/actions/pvp/leaderboards"; interface RankedArenaClientProps { season: PvpSeason | null; playerRating: PlayerRating; leaderboard: UnifiedLeaderboardEntry[]; userId: string; faction: Faction; } export function RankedArenaClient({ season, playerRating, leaderboard, userId, faction }: RankedArenaClientProps) { const [isMatchmakingOpen, setIsMatchmakingOpen] = useState(false); if (!season) { return (

No Active Season

The arena is currently closed for maintenance.

); } const daysRemaining = Math.ceil((new Date(season.endDate).getTime() - new Date().getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); return (
{/* HEADER HERO */}
Season {season.name}

Ranked Arena

Compete in rated battles to climb the ladder, earn exclusive titles, and claim seasonal rewards. Glory awaits the strong.

Ends in {daysRemaining} days
Your Standing
{playerRating.rating}
Current Rating
{playerRating.wins}
Wins
{playerRating.losses}
Losses
{playerRating.peakRating}
Peak
{/* LEADERBOARD & REWARDS */} Global Leaderboard Season Rewards
{leaderboard.map((entry, index) => ( ))} {leaderboard.length === 0 && ( )}
Rank Titan Rating Win Rate
{index < 3 ? ( #{index + 1} ) : ( `#${index + 1}` )}
{entry.name}
{entry.metadata?.title || "Novice"}
 {entry.metadata?.wins + entry.metadata?.losses > 0 ? Math.round((entry.metadata?.wins / (entry.metadata?.wins + entry.metadata?.losses)) * 100) : 0}%
No warriors have entered the arena yet.
High Warlord (Top 1)

• Exclusive Title: "High Warlord"

• 5000 Gems

• Legendary Weapon Skin

 Champion (2400+ SR)

• Title: "Champion"

• 2000 Gems

• Epic Armor Set

 Gladiator (1800+ SR)

• 1000 Gems

• Rare Equipment Box
setIsMatchmakingOpen(false)} currentRating={playerRating.rating} />
); }
